Self.Wiki: Determines parameters relating to the rendering of parts within menus.

initModelDegX.AltName: Initial Angle of the Model: X
initModelDegX.Wiki: The initial angle (on the x-axis) of the model.

initModelDegY.AltName: Initial Angle of the Model: Y
initModelDegY.Wiki: The initial angle (on the y-axis) of the model.
